title: Support of Taiwan independence could spark US military conflict with China, Chinese ambassador says
description: China and the United States could end up in a military conflict if the United States encourages Taiwan's independence, Beijing's ambassador to Washington said in a US radio interview broadcast on Friday.

title: Governor's unusual move cracks up CNN anchors
description: Gov. Jim Justice (R-WV) used his pet bulldog to fire back at critics during his annual State of the State speech - singling out Bette Midler's earlier criticism of Sen. Joe Manchin (D-WV).

title: Lithuania warns that Ukraine invasion will lead to 'war of Europe'
description: Lithuanian Foreign Minister Gabrielius Landsbergis reacts to Germany's position on reinforcing Ukraine and surrounding regions, saying a possible war between Russia and Ukraine will actually be a 'war of Europe'.

title: Oil executives barred from leaving Peru after massive spill causes 'ecological disaster'
description: Four oil executives in Peru have been barred from leaving the country as authorities investigate a massive oil spill that forced Lima to declare an environmental emergency earlier this month.

title: Meryl Streep asked what President she based Netflix role on. Hear her reply
description: CNN's Christiane Amanpour speaks with Oscar-winning actress Meryl Streep and Director Adam McKay about the Netflix hit film "Don't Look Up."

title: Hiker fell 700 feet to his death while trying to take a photo
description: A hiker in Arizona slipped and fell hundreds of feet to his death Monday after trying to take a photo in Lost Dutchman State Park, according to the Pinal County Sheriff's Office.

title: Dramatic video shows off-duty police officer stopping armed robbery
description: An off-duty police officer went into a supermarket near Barcelona, Spain to buy groceries and ended up tackling a suspected armed robber.

title: Bridge in Pittsburgh collapses hours before scheduled Biden visit to talk infrastructure
See off-duty cop take down attempted armed robber
description: An officer in Spain sprung to action at a supermarket near Barcelona when he realized an armed robbery was afoot.

title: Landmark moment as Iranian women in attendance to watch Iran qualify for World Cup
description: Iranian women were allowed to share a landmark moment as Iran secured qualification on Thursday for November's World Cup in Qatar.

title: Italy's former royal family wants the crown jewels back
description: Italy's former royal family has asked the country's central bank to return the crown jewels, a lawyer for the family confirmed to CNN.

title: Elon Musk just took the entire EV sector down with these comments
'Shang-Chi' star Simu Liu voices support for vaccines after revealing he lost grandparents to Covid
description: Simu Liu, the star of Marvel's "Shang-Chi," is voicing his support for Covid-19 vaccines after revealing he lost his grandparents to the virus.

title: Lawmaker pushes conspiracy about athletes' responses to Covid vaccine
description: CNN's Chris Cillizza fact-checks the entirely false claim pushed by Senator Ron Johnson (R-WI) that athletes have been "dropping dead on the field" due to the Covid-19 vaccine.

title: 'Janet Jackson' tells the singer's story, but it's clear who's in control
description: Janet Jackson gave a documentary crew access for five years, but with Jackson and brother Randy Jackson serving as executive producers the resulting project, "Janet Jackson," feels too conspicuously like a licensed product. Addressing some uncomfortable parts of her biography but sidestepping others, it's pretty obvious who's in control here.

title: A woman has never won this Oscar. That could soon change
description: Cinematography is the final frontier for women at the Oscars. Gendered acting categories aside, after 93 years, it is the only category that still exists for which a woman has never won an Academy Award.

title: In pictures: Photography contest turns lens on life in China
description: A village shadow puppet show, a shepherd grazing livestock and a pair of young acrobats performing handstands are among the scenes depicted in a photography competition shining a light on life in China.

title: 'Working through list of missiles': Expert on North Korea testing
description: CNN's Paula Hancocks reports as North Korea is believed to have launched a sixth missile test -- a record for the month of January.
